recipe_metadata.title: AI Services Deployment (Master Recipe)
recipe_metadata.description: This is a master recipe that orchestrates the deployment and configuration of various AI services. It uses a hardware profiler to determine compatible services and allows for user customization via a central configuration file. It is composed of multiple, modular sub-recipes.

recipe_overview.description: Deploys a comprehensive, user-configurable AI service layer. Defaults to Ollama and Open WebUI, with optional services like vLLM and AnythingLLM. Intelligently selects and pulls LLMs based on detected hardware and user preferences.

tasks.title: Initialize AI Services Configuration
tasks.description: Create a default configuration file for the AI services module. This file will be populated by the hardware profiler and can be overridden by the user to select their preferred services and models.
acceptance_criteria: A default 'config/ai_services_config.yml' is created with placeholder values for services and models.

execution_plan: 2. Execute the `01-hardware-profiler.json` sub-recipe to populate the hardware details in the config.
3. Read the final configuration (user overrides applied) to determine which services to deploy.
4. Execute the sub-recipes for the selected services in order.
Refer to the `README.json` in the `modules/` directory for details on each sub-recipe.
